data.fullContent: Sharon is a teenager, and she loves rock music. She dresses in dark clothes, and usually wears t-shirts with bands on them. She paints her nails black, and she always has her headphones in. She likes to attend concerts, but her favorite thing is to go to the record store and listen to new albums.
data.answer: 莎伦是个青少年，她喜欢摇滚乐。她穿深色的衣服，通常穿带箍的t恤。她把指甲涂成黑色，还总是戴着耳机。她喜欢听音乐会，但是她最喜欢的事情是去唱片店听新专辑。
